title: Nah - he was in a big house before (TEFC)
creator_contributor_role: La Trobe University. Centre for the Study of Educational Communication and Media, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teachers and community
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rural families
description: The experiences of a teacher in his first year of teaching in a country high school. Investigates the town, the people, and the activities of the township, and then looks at the school and the problems concerning teachers in the school, with particular reference to his own experience in his first year. Written and directed by Dave McRae.
